ComicInfo.Series: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
ComicInfo.Summary:
Volume 1, with a new cover by Steve Lavigne, collects issues #1-4, which include the stories 'A Tale of the TMNT,' 'Nobody's Fool,' 'All Hallow's Thieves,' and 'I, Monster.' Read along again (or for the first time!) to enjoy the enormity of the Turtles' universe.
Story TitlesA Tale of the Teenage Mutant Ninja TurtlesNobody's FoolAll Hallows ThievesI, Monster
